body.p: Father of Naarai, one of David’s elite force known as “the thirty” (1 Chr 11:37). In 2 Samuel 23:35 he is called Paarai the Arbite. This has led some interpreters to suggest that “the son of Ezbai” in the 1 Chronicles passage is a corruption of “the Arbite” and that the correct reading of his name should be Naarai the Arbite.
